title: The humiliation of the Sonne of God by his becomming the Son of man, by taking the forme of a servant, and by his sufferings under Pontius Pilat, &c. Or The eighth book of commentaries vpon the Apostles Creed: continued by Thomas Jackson Dr. in Divinitie, chaplaine to his Majestie in ordinarie, and president of Corpus Christi Colledge in Oxford. Divided into foure sections.
author: Jackson, Thomas, 1579-1640.
publisher: Printed by M. Flesher for John Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
